Command Line Utilites
**********************

Convert BAM to BED
==================

.. argparse::
   :module: bam2bed 
   :func: getParser
   :prog: bame2bed

Counts the number of overlapping between two BED files
======================================================

.. argparse::
   :module: checkMatches 
   :func: getParser
   :prog: checkMatches

Generate coverage over nucleosomes
==================================

.. argparse::
   :module: getAvrCov 
   :func: getParser
   :prog: getAvrCov

Count reads per nucleosome
==========================

.. argparse::
   :module: getCounts 
   :func: getParser
   :prog: getCounts

Produces coverage figures
=========================

.. argparse::
   :module: getFigures 
   :func: getParser
   :prog: getFigures

Generate coverage over nucleosomes
==================================

.. argparse::
   :module: getProfile
   :func: getParser
   :prog: getProfile

Meges the rows of two BED files
===============================

.. argparse::
   :module: merged
   :func: getParser
   :prog: merged
